definition: Asian area/the Far East/Asia Pacific region

sentences.english: Cathy admitted that the regional contest was never an easy game.
sentences.chinese: 陳夢穎承認參與亞太區比賽絕不輕易。

sentences.english: Cosmoprof Asia is the definitive venue to find new products and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 亞太區美容展是發掘新產品及意念的最佳平臺。

sentences.english: Wai-Shin Chan is director of climate-change strategy, Asia Pacific, for HSBC Global Research.
sentences.chinese: 陳偉欣，匯豐環球研究氣候變化策略亞太區總監。

sentences.english: President of Asian Region of European Union , Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 一九九二年成爲歐洲聯盟亞太區會長。

sentences.english: Mike Lin is the Vice President of Shared Services in UPS Asia Pacific Region.
sentences.chinese: 林義現擔任UPS亞太區服務共享副總裁。

definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration

Greater China/refers to China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (esp. in finance and economics)/refers to all areas of Chinese presence (esp. in the cultural field), including parts of Southeast Asia, Europe and the Americas
